description: The documentation generation process is orchestrated by the `Output Generation Engine`, primarily implemented in `demo.py`. This engine is responsible for cloning the target Git repository using `Repository Utilities` and then initiating the architectural analysis through the `Diagram Generator`. Once the analysis is complete, the `Output Generation Engine` dispatches the generation of documentation to various specialized generators, including the `Markdown Generator`, `HTML Generator`, `MDX Generator`, and `Sphinx Generator`, based on the desired output format. The `HTML Generator` further interacts with the `HTML Template Populator` to produce interactive HTML documentation. This modular design allows for flexible and extensible documentation generation across different formats.

components.name: Output Generation Engine
components.description: The primary component responsible for orchestrating the overall process of generating documentation in various formats. It handles repository cloning, initiates the analysis generation, and dispatches the actual documentation generation to specific format generators based on the desired output.

components.name: Markdown Generator
components.description: Generates standard Markdown documentation, including embedded Mermaid diagrams and basic component details, making the architectural insights easily readable in Markdown viewers.

components.name: HTML Generator
components.description: Creates standalone HTML documentation, specifically preparing data (e.g., Cytoscape.js compatible JSON) for interactive architectural diagrams.

components.name: MDX Generator
components.description: Produces MDX (Markdown with JSX) files, incorporating Mermaid diagrams and frontmatter for rich, interactive documentation experiences, suitable for modern documentation sites.

components.name: Sphinx Generator
components.description: Generates reStructuredText (RST) formatted documentation, including embedded Mermaid diagrams and structured component information, suitable for Sphinx documentation projects.

components.name: HTML Template Populator
components.description: Integrates generated architectural data (like Cytoscape JSON and component-specific HTML snippets) into a predefined HTML template to produce the final, complete, and styled HTML output.
